I can help you make firefox faster if you want
open firefox and type this into the urlbar: about:config
in the "Filter" textbox type this in: ipv6
if the key network.dns.disableIPv6 is true, double-click it to make it false. we're going to be working with a few keys so keep that window oipen
ok, that one is done. in the Filter textbox, type in :pipelining
ok, that one is done. in the Filter textbox, type in: pipelining
make the network.http.pipelining and network.http.proxy.pipelining keys to true
double-click the network.http.pipelining.maxrequests key and change 4 to 8
now, restart firefox and see if it's faster
much faster?
There are more tweaks here, but I haven't done the others: http://howto.helpero.com/howto/Speed-Up-Firefox_31.html
